movies.title: Lupin III: Green vs. Red
movies.plot: Wearing his signature red jacket, Lupin aims to steal the "Ice Cube" treasure from the military organization "Nighthawks". However, another Lupin shows up dressed in the older signature green jacket aiming for the same prize. How can there be two Lupins?
movies.simplePlot: Wearing his signature red jacket, Lupin aims to steal the "Ice Cube" treasure from the military organization "Nighthawks". However, another Lupin shows up dressed in the older signature ...

biography.bio: Kan'ichi Kurita was born on March 3, 1958 in Tokyo, Japan as Yoshiyuki Kurihara. He is an actor, known for Lupin III vs. Conan (2013), Lupin III: Farewell to Nostradamus (1995) and Lupin III - Mort ou vif (1996).
biography.name: Kan'ichi Kurita

biography.bio: Kiyoshi Kobayashi was born on January 11, 1933 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for The Castle of Cagliostro (1979), Lupin the 3rd (1977) and Daitokai - Tatakai no hibi (1976).
biography.name: Kiyoshi Kobayashi

biography.bio: Makio Inoue was born on November 30, 1940 in Yamanashi, Japan as Takao Inoue. He is an actor, known for The Castle of Cagliostro (1979), Lupin the 3rd (1977) and Arcadia of My Youth (1982).
biography.name: Makio Inoue

biography.bio: Eiko Masuyama was born on April 22, 1936 in Tokyo, Japan as Tomoko Masada. She is an actress, known for The Castle of Cagliostro (1979), Chappie, the Witch (1972) and Cherry miel (1973).
biography.name: Eiko Masuyama

biography.bio: Gorô Naya was born on November 17, 1929 in Hakodate, Hokkaido, Japan. He was an actor, known for Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (1984), The Castle of Cagliostro (1979) and Lupin the 3rd (1977). He was married to Kachiko Hino. He died on March 5, 2013 in Chiba, Chiba, Japan.
biography.name: Gorô Naya

biography.bio: Jin Katagiri is an actor, known for The Quiz Show (2008), Sei kazoku - yamatoji (2010) and Uchû inusakusen (2010).
biography.name: Jin Katagiri

biography.bio: Aya Hirano was born on October 8, 1987 in Nagoya, Japan. She is an actress, known for Death Note (2006), La disparition de Haruhi Suzumiya (2010) and Fairy Tail: Priestess of the Phoenix (2012).
biography.name: Aya Hirano

biography.bio: Katsuhisa Hôki was born on October 29, 1946 in Nagasaki, Japan. He is known for his work on One Piece (1999), Sword of the Stranger (2007) and Origine (2006).
biography.name: Katsuhisa Hôki

biography.bio: Nobuaki Fukuda was born on December 18, 1950 in Nagasaki, Japan. He is an actor, known for Silence (2016), Naruto Shippûden: The Lost Tower (2010) and Naruto: Shippûden (2007).
biography.name: Nobuaki Fukuda

biography.bio: Yu Shimaka was born on May 6, 1949 in Nagano, Japan. He is an actor, known for Porco Rosso (1992), Kagemusha, l'ombre du guerrier (1980) and Cobra (1982).
biography.name: Yu Shimaka

biography.bio: Genmu Kiyokawa is an actor, known for Lupin III: Green vs. Red (2008), Neon Genesis Evangelion (1995) and Gun x Sword (2005).
biography.name: Genmu Kiyokawa

biography.bio: Mugihito was born on August 8, 1944 in Musashino, Japan as Makoto Terada. He is an actor, known for Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (1984), Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion (1997) and Tekkonkinkreet (2006).
biography.name: Mugihito

biography.bio: Ken'ichi Ogata was born on March 29, 1942 in Fukuoka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Lamu (1981), Inuyasha (2000) and Conan le detective (1996).
biography.name: Ken'ichi Ogata

biography.bio: Takashi Taguchi was born on May 8, 1942. He is an actor, known for Urotsukidôji II: Legend of the Demon Womb (1990), Gatchaman (1972) and Sword for Truth (1990).
biography.name: Takashi Taguchi

biography.bio: Josh Keller is an actor, known for Evangelion: 2.0 You Can (Not) Advance (2009), Lupin III: Green vs. Red (2008) and Arc Rise Fantasia (2009).
biography.name: Josh Keller
